entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm in areas of heaviest snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
